name: Dreams On The Side
description:
Made for Mini Jam 18: Dreams

Limitation is to use only three colors.

Based loosely on a dream I had, you must avoid and shoot down the chess pieces.

Move with WASD, shoot with SPACE or the left mouse button.

You can only shoot out the sides! The nightmare lasts for two minutes, go for a high score!

Have fun!
